vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.28
§ Athlai = "whom Jehovah afflicts"
one of the sons of Bebai and one who put away his foreign wife in the time of Ezra
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hombre; casado con una esposa extranjera; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞勒 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "被耶和華苦待的"
比拜的眾子之一, 因以斯拉的要求而被迫和其外邦妻子離婚 (拉 10:28)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚勒 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "被耶和华苦待的"
比拜的众子之一, 因以斯拉的要求而被迫和其外邦妻子离婚 (拉 10:28)
